name: 林子喬
objective:
Discuss the theories and designs of kinds of AC electric machines, including: (1) Magnetomotive Force and Flux Distribution on AC Machines; (2) Energy Conversion of AC machines; (3) Winding Insulation in an AC Machine; (4) Voltage and Speed Regulation; (5) Concept of Synchronous Machine Design; (6) Concept of Induction Machine Design.

探討各種交流電機原理與設計，內容包含：(1) 交流電機的磁力和磁通分佈；(2) 交流電機能量轉換基礎；(3) 交流電機的繞組絕緣；(4) 電壓與速度調整；(5) 同步電機設計觀念；(6) 感應電機設計觀念.
schedule:
Wk1: Course Introduction And Rules (課程簡介及上課規則)
Wk2~Wk6: Introduction to AC Machines And Fundamentals (交流電機介紹及原理基礎)
Wk7~Wk8: Synchronous Machine Design (同步電機設計)
Wk9: Midterm Close Book Exam (期中紙本考試)
Wk10~Wk12: Synchronous Machine Design (同步電機設計)
Wk13~Wk17: Induction Machine Design (感應電機設計)
Wk18: Final Close Book Exam (期末紙本考試)
scorePolicy: (一). Participation, Discussion, and Homework (出席討論與作業): 20%; (二). Midterm Exam (期中考): 40%; (三). Final Exam (期末考): 40%.
